title: OrionSearch
text: It supports field-level boosting and phrase queries. The query language supports proximity operators using `~k` syntax. OrionSearch serves as a full-text search engine with BM25 ranking.

title: OrionSearch
text: Synonym expansion is configured in `orion.yml`. The indexer uses incremental segment merges.

title: OrionSearch
text: OrionSearch community survey results will be published next quarter.

title: OrionSearch
text: Users on forums discussed OrionSearch tutorials and workshop schedules.

title: OrionSearch
text: OrionSearch release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: ANLP
text: It provides sentence splitting, NER, and lemmatization for 50+ languages. Dictionaries are configured in `atlas.yml`. AtlasNLP has a rule-based fallback for rare tokens.

title: ANLP
text: AtlasNLP is a multilingual text processing suite. Models are packaged in ONNX format for portability.

title: Atlas NLP
text: Atlas NLP community survey results will be published next quarter.

title: Nebula DB
text: It supports JSON documents with automatic schema inference.

title: NebulaDB
text: NebulaDB uses a CRDT-based replication protocol for offline-first apps. The default port for NebulaDB is 7342. NebulaDB provides role-based access control with three roles: reader, writer, admin. Defaults are sensible for most users.

title: NebulaDB
text: NebulaDB is a lightweight document store built for edge devices.

title: NDB
text: NDB release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: Nebula DB
text: Users on forums discussed Nebula DB tutorials and workshop schedules.

title: Mercury RL
text: Trajectories can be exported to NumPy NPZ files. MercuryRL is a reinforcement learning toolkit for robotics.

title: MRL
text: It includes PPO and SAC reference implementations. Sim2real transfer is assisted by domain randomization utilities. MercuryRL uses YAML experiment manifests.

title: MRL
text: MRL release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: Mercury RL
text: Mercury RL release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: VulcanGraph
text: It supports ACID transactions with snapshot isolation. Indexes can be created per label and property.

title: VulcanGraph
text: VulcanGraph is a property graph database with Gremlin-like traversal. Bulk loads stream via CSV with a `vgraph load` command. It exposes a REST API on port 7787 by default.

title: VulcanGraph
text: VulcanGraph release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.

title: VulcanGraph
text: VulcanGraph release notes mention minor UI tweaks and logging improvements.
